trans-unit.source: Using the HDInsight connector in Logic Apps | Microsoft Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Using the HDInsight connector in Logic Apps | Microsoft Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: How to create and configure the HDInsight Connector or API app and use it in a logic app in Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: How to create and configure the HDInsight Connector or API app and use it in a logic app in Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: Get started with the HDInsight Connector and add it to your Logic App
trans-unit.target: Get started with the HDInsight Connector and add it to your Logic App

trans-unit.source: HDInsight Connector lets you create a Hadoop clusters on Azure and submit various Hadoop jobs such as Hive, Pig, MapReduce and Streaming MapReduce jobs.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight Connector lets you create a Hadoop clusters on Azure and submit various Hadoop jobs such as Hive, Pig, MapReduce and Streaming MapReduce jobs.

trans-unit.source: Azure HDInsight service deploys and provisions Apache Hadoop clusters in the cloud, providing a software framework designed to manage, analyze, and report on big data.
trans-unit.target: Azure HDInsight service deploys and provisions Apache Hadoop clusters in the cloud, providing a software framework designed to manage, analyze, and report on big data.

trans-unit.source: The Hadoop core provides reliable data storage with the Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS), and a simple MapReduce programming model to process and analyze, in parallel, the data stored in this distributed system.
trans-unit.target: The Hadoop core provides reliable data storage with the Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS), and a simple MapReduce programming model to process and analyze, in parallel, the data stored in this distributed system.

trans-unit.source: Using HDInsight connector, you can create or delete a cluster, submit a job and wait for it to complete.
trans-unit.target: Using HDInsight connector, you can create or delete a cluster, submit a job and wait for it to complete.

trans-unit.source: Connectors can be used in Logic apps to fetch, process or push data as a part of a flow.
trans-unit.target: Connectors can be used in Logic apps to fetch, process or push data as a part of a flow.

trans-unit.source: You can add the HDInsight connector to your business workflow and process data as part of this workflow within a Logic App.
trans-unit.target: You can add the HDInsight connector to your business workflow and process data as part of this workflow within a Logic App.

trans-unit.source: Basic Actions
trans-unit.target: Basic Actions

trans-unit.source: Create Cluster
trans-unit.target: Create Cluster

trans-unit.source: Wait For Cluster Creation
trans-unit.target: Wait For Cluster Creation

trans-unit.source: Submit Pig Job
trans-unit.target: Submit Pig Job

trans-unit.source: Submit Hive Job
trans-unit.target: Submit Hive Job

trans-unit.source: Submit MapReduce Job
trans-unit.target: Submit MapReduce Job

trans-unit.target: Wait For Job Completion

trans-unit.source: Delete Cluster
trans-unit.target: Delete Cluster

trans-unit.source: Create the HDInsight Connector API App
trans-unit.target: Create the HDInsight Connector API App

trans-unit.source: A connector can be created within a logic app or be created directly from the Azure Marketplace.
trans-unit.target: A connector can be created within a logic app or be created directly from the Azure Marketplace.

trans-unit.source: To create a connector from the Marketplace:
trans-unit.target: To create a connector from the Marketplace:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure startboard, select **Marketplace**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure startboard, select **Marketplace**.

trans-unit.source: Search for “HDInsight Connector”, select it, and select **Create**.
trans-unit.target: Search for “HDInsight Connector”, select it, and select **Create**.

trans-unit.source: Enter the Name, App Service Plan, and other properties.
trans-unit.target: Enter the Name, App Service Plan, and other properties.

trans-unit.source: In the Package settings, enter the HDInsight cluster user name and password.
trans-unit.target: In the Package settings, enter the HDInsight cluster user name and password.

trans-unit.source: Select **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Select **OK**.

trans-unit.source: Select **Create**:
trans-unit.target: Select **Create**:

trans-unit.source: Certificate Configuration (Optional)
trans-unit.target: Certificate Configuration (Optional)

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] This step is required only if you want to perform management operations (create and delete of clusters) in logic app.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] This step is required only if you want to perform management operations (create and delete of clusters) in logic app.

trans-unit.source: Browse to the just created HDInsight Connector API App and you will see that the 'Security' component shows 0 - meaning that there is no management certificate uploaded:
trans-unit.target: Browse to the just created HDInsight Connector API App and you will see that the 'Security' component shows 0 - meaning that there is no management certificate uploaded:

trans-unit.source: To upload the management certificate to your API App:
trans-unit.target: To upload the management certificate to your API App:

trans-unit.source: Select the 'Security' component.
trans-unit.target: Select the 'Security' component.

trans-unit.source: In the 'Security' blade, select **UPLOAD CERTIFICATE**.
trans-unit.target: In the 'Security' blade, select **UPLOAD CERTIFICATE**.

trans-unit.source: Browse and select the certificate file in the next blade.
trans-unit.target: Browse and select the certificate file in the next blade.

trans-unit.source: Once the certificate is selected, select **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Once the certificate is selected, select **OK**.

trans-unit.source: Once the certificate is successfully uploaded, the certificate details are shown:
trans-unit.target: Once the certificate is successfully uploaded, the certificate details are shown:

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If you want to change the certificate, you can upload another certificate ; which replaces the existing certificate.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If you want to change the certificate, you can upload another certificate ; which replaces the existing certificate.

trans-unit.source: Using the connector in a Logic App
trans-unit.target: Using the connector in a Logic App

trans-unit.source: HDInsight Connector can be used only as an action in logic app.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight Connector can be used only as an action in logic app.

trans-unit.source: Let us take a simple logic app which creates a cluster, runs a 'Hive' job and deletes the cluster at the end of job completion.
trans-unit.target: Let us take a simple logic app which creates a cluster, runs a 'Hive' job and deletes the cluster at the end of job completion.

trans-unit.source: In the 'Start logic' card, click 'Run this logic manually'.
trans-unit.target: In the 'Start logic' card, click 'Run this logic manually'.

trans-unit.source: Select the HDInsight Connector API App created from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: Select the HDInsight Connector API App created from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: The available actions are listed:
trans-unit.target: The available actions are listed:

trans-unit.source: Select 'Create Cluster', enter all the required cluster parameters, and select the ✓:
trans-unit.target: Select 'Create Cluster', enter all the required cluster parameters, and select the ✓:

trans-unit.source: The action now appears as configured in the logic app.
trans-unit.target: The action now appears as configured in the logic app.

trans-unit.source: The output(s) of the action are shown and can be used inputs in any subsequent actions:
trans-unit.target: The output(s) of the action are shown and can be used inputs in any subsequent actions:

trans-unit.source: Select the same HDInsight connector from gallery as an action.
trans-unit.target: Select the same HDInsight connector from gallery as an action.

trans-unit.source: Select 'Wait For Cluster Creation' action, enter all the required parameters, and select the ✓:
trans-unit.target: Select 'Wait For Cluster Creation' action, enter all the required parameters, and select the ✓:

trans-unit.source: Select the same HDInsight connector from gallery as an action.
trans-unit.target: Select the same HDInsight connector from gallery as an action.

trans-unit.source: Select 'Submit Hive Job' action, enter all the required parameters, and select the ✓:
trans-unit.target: Select 'Submit Hive Job' action, enter all the required parameters, and select the ✓:

trans-unit.source: Select the same HDInsight connector from gallery as an action.
trans-unit.target: Select the same HDInsight connector from gallery as an action.

trans-unit.source: Select 'Wait For Job Completion' action, enter all the required parameters, and select the ✓:
trans-unit.target: Select 'Wait For Job Completion' action, enter all the required parameters, and select the ✓:

trans-unit.source: Select the same HDInsight connector from gallery as an action.
trans-unit.target: Select the same HDInsight connector from gallery as an action.

trans-unit.source: Select 'Delete Cluster' action, enter all the required parameters, and select the ✓:
trans-unit.target: Select 'Delete Cluster' action, enter all the required parameters, and select the ✓:

trans-unit.source: Save the logic app using the save command at the top of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Save the logic app using the save command at the top of the designer.

trans-unit.source: To test the scenario, select **Run Now** to start the logic app manually.
trans-unit.target: To test the scenario, select **Run Now** to start the logic app manually.

trans-unit.source: Do more with your Connector
trans-unit.target: Do more with your Connector

trans-unit.source: Now that the connector is created, you can add it to a business workflow using a Logic App.
trans-unit.target: Now that the connector is created, you can add it to a business workflow using a Logic App.

trans-unit.source: See [What are Logic Apps?](app-service-logic-what-are-logic-apps.md).
trans-unit.target: See [What are Logic Apps?](app-service-logic-what-are-logic-apps.md).

trans-unit.source: View the Swagger REST API reference at [Connectors and API Apps Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=529766).
trans-unit.target: View the Swagger REST API reference at [Connectors and API Apps Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=529766).

trans-unit.source: You can also review performance statistics and control security to the connector.
trans-unit.target: You can also review performance statistics and control security to the connector.

trans-unit.source: See [Manage and Monitor your built-in API Apps and Connectors](app-service-logic-monitor-your-connectors.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Manage and Monitor your built-in API Apps and Connectors](app-service-logic-monitor-your-connectors.md).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
